thread.title: Regus opens ‘Express’ workspace at Chester services
thread.title_full: Regus opens ‘Express’ workspace at Chester services

title: Regus opens ‘Express’ workspace at Chester services
text:
0 comments Mark Caswell Wed, 30 Sep 2015 12:12 Follow @BBT_online Workspace provider Regus has opened its latest Express workspace, located at Chester Services on the M56.
The new facilities include a business lounge with free wifi , and meeting rooms which are bookable by the hour.
The Chester workspace is the latest in what Regus is calling its “Third Place rollout” – professional workspaces and office facilities at places “where business people and mobile workers pass through in daily life”.
The group recently opened a lounge on the third floor of The News Building on London Bridge Street and facilities within Hilton Manchester Airport.
The new workspace at Chester Services is part of a wider rollout of Express lounges across the Roadchef network, with other sites including Clacket Lane (M25), Strensham North (M5), Norton Canes and Sandbach South (both M6).
Entry to Regus Express centres costs £5 per hour or £10 per day pay-as-you-go, or £49 per month for Regus Businessworld membership.
